title: How should a student choose his career after the higher secondary level of education? - Quora

response.answer_text: It must be purely based on interest and not based on people’s advice and suggestion. The student must get to know about all the higher studies, about what do they deal with and their scope by googling and by enquiring about it to the experienced ones. Later he/she must choose the one based on his/her own interest. One’s own interest matters the most.
